info.title: Team Manager Class
info.description: Manages the active team and the account's all teams.

prop.name: loggedIn
prop.description: Indicates whether the team is logged in for this run.

method.name: info
method.description: Get all the public information about a team. If the team is the current account team, include private information.

parameter.name: $teamID
parameter.description: The team id. Leave empty for current team id. It is empty by default.

method.returndescription: An array of the team data.

method.name: updateInfo

parameter.name: $name
parameter.description: The team name. It cannot be empty.

parameter.name: $description
parameter.description: The team description.

parameter.name: $uname
parameter.description: The team unique name. This is used for friendly urls and unique identification of the team in the system.

parameter.name: $teamID
parameter.description: The team id. If empty or in secure mode this will be the current team. It is empty by default.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: updateProfileImage

parameter.name: $image
parameter.description: The image data. The image should be in png format.

parameter.name: $teamID
parameter.description: The team id. If empty or in secure mode this will be the current team. It is empty by default.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: validate
method.description: Validates if the current account is member of the current team.

parameter.name: $teamID
parameter.description: The team id to validate the account. If empty, get the current team id. It is empty by default.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: logout
method.description: Logout the account from the team.

method.name: switchTeam
method.description: Switch from one team to another. The account must be valid and member of the given team id.

parameter.name: $teamID
parameter.description: The team id to switch to.

parameter.name: $password
parameter.description: The account's current password.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: getDefaultTeam
method.description: Get the default team for the given account.

method.name: setDefaultTeam
method.description: Set the default team for the given account.

parameter.name: $teamID
parameter.description: The team id to set as default.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: getAccountTeams
method.description: Get all teams of the current account.

method.name: getTeamMembers

parameter.name: $includeManagedAccounts
parameter.description: Set to TRUE to include managed accounts that are children of team member accounts. It is FALSE by default.

method.returndescription: An array of all public account information for each member.

method.name: getTeamUname
method.description: Get the current team's unique name.

method.name: getTeamFolder
method.description: Gets the team's profile folder. The folder is created if doesn't exist.

parameter.name: $teamID
parameter.description:
The team id to get the folder for.
NOTICE: This doesn't work when in secure mode.

method.returndescription: The team folder path. If there is no active team, it returns FALSE.

method.name: getServicesFolder
method.description: Get a service's folder inside the team root folder.

parameter.name: $serviceName
parameter.description: The service name.

parameter.name: $teamID
parameter.description:
The team id to get the service folder for.
NOTICE: This doesn't work when in secure mode (by importer).

parameter.name: $systemAppData
parameter.description: This indicates the service folder as System App and will be placed in a special folder. It is FALSE by default.

method.name: getTeamValue
method.description: Gets a team value from the session. If the session is not set yet, updates from the database.

parameter.name: $name
parameter.description: The value name.

method.name: getFolderID
method.description: Gets the unique folder id for the requested use.

parameter.name: $prefix
parameter.description: The prefix of the folder.

parameter.name: $folderID
parameter.description: The id to be hashed.

parameter.name: $extension
parameter.description: The extension of the folder (if any).
